content.detailedDescription: The first time i noticed the object i was going outside to have a cigarette.  i noticed a light in the sky that was bright red it stood out from all the other lights in the sky.  i stood outside wondering if it was an oddly colored star, but it started moving westward in the sky slowly at first, then it started flying in ways that no plane or helicopter could possibly move.  it seemed to zig-zag back and forth horizontally, now it had really captured my attention and i stood outside for three hours watching the object, i grabbed my binoculors and i could see not only red lights but also green, amber, white, and a small blue flash.  the next night i went out to smoke and to my surprise it was there again in the same location, this time i tried to take piictures with my digital camera, but i didn't have much sucess getiing a good picture.  i began looking every night and i saw this thing in the sky every night for three months.  i tried to get a better view from my telescope but the lenses weren't good enough.  i started going out at night trying to follow the object and see how close i could get.  i never managed to get too close until one night my sister and i were on our way home from dover and spotted the object, she had witnessed it from my house with sveral other family members.  we decided to go up the mountain road to get a better view.  when we got to the top we could see the object closer it was hovering in one spot so we stopped the car and waited, the object had a bright white light shining and started to move closer toward the car, we became frighted and very quickly drove down the mountain.  my mother had called the news channel to tell them i had been seeing this object, but i did not call back, i had alreadly been teased at work for telling my coworkers and did not want to have the news crew come out.  i have no idea what the object was and i don't have strong enough equiptment to get a better view or any clear pictures. several times when driving around looking at the object we noticed there were two more identical objects in the same area, they had the same lights and wheneverr there were more then one they seemed to travel in a triangular pattern in the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object in sky moving in very strange ways, bright white light with colored flashing lights

content.detailedDescription: I woke up and noticed a bright light in the eastern ese sky (i have a large wall of windows).  it seemed too large to be a plane and it was only moving slightly but not going anywhere.  i noticed that 15 minutes had passed and it was still there.  it appeared to have metallic reflection as it caught some light.  i tried several pair of eyeglasses to get the best view.  i saw it through tree branches however it was maybe only the size of a bb.  my first thought was, "what the heck is that?"  i stared at it for about an hour, when it eventually it got higher in the sky and moved further away to about the size of a star.  however hardly any other stars were noticeable by that time as it was getting to be daylight.  so it appeared to move away from me going ese.
content.summary: Something too large for plane hung in sky for an hour before and at dawn then moved away

content.detailedDescription: 1 answer= mand my dad was comeing back from some wear and we was in his truck and we happen to look over wear a some appartments was and we seen something hovering over top the apperments at first we thought it was a search helicoptor but we was thinking if it wsa a search helicoptor we wouldof heard the blades going on the helicoptor but we didn't we didn't hear no sound so after we drove past the apparments the object started to follow up half way home but by the time me and me dad got home the object was going and never see it again no more after that.
content.summary: Well it was a circler object

content.detailedDescription:
I steped out on my patio to smoke a camel as i sat down i looked up in the eat and saw what looked like mars but about 50% brighter i was thinging how odd it looked when it started to move east to west i called my friend to love he said cool and whent back inside then his girl friend drove up and i yelled out and pointed it out to her she watched it as well just before it finally got with in the orion constallation a small white light droped from it then its light turned off
as it was moving it would flicker like a star and seemed to drift in random directions as it moved slowly.

my reaction and gut feeling is that it was a very high altitude aircraft. i keeped watching even after my smoke was finnished that takes 5 mins
content.summary: Looked like mars till it started to move east to west it was higher then a comercial flight that passed under it

content.detailedDescription:
Corner of high drive and 29th ave. facing due north.

while in my car, sitting still at a stop sign, i observed a triangle shaped object hovering in the northern sky.  it did not move at all (side to side or away or closer) the entire observation.

i first noticed the object when i reached to adjust my rear view mirror.  i noticed it at the "top" portion of my front window, directly ahead of me.

the object looked like a fram air filter molded into a triangle shape.  the object did not move while i was observing it.  

i looked and studied the object for several seconds.  i saw that it was large and quite far away yet not moving (flying).  i aligned the object with the edge of my rear view mirror and sat very still.  the object still did not move, not even a tiny bit.  

the radio was on at the time and after approx. 4-5 minutes i thought i'd turn it off and "listen" for any sounds.  i looked down for a split second to turn off the radio.  when i looked up, the object was gone.  completely gone from anywhere in the sky.  this was a beautiful clear sunday morning with not a cloud in the sky.  i opened up my sun roof and look around thoroughly.  the object was nowhere in sight.  then suddenly, where the triangle was hovering a jet airliner came into view from the ne.  it flew slowly into view from the right side of my car's front window and headed on a path straight across my window in front of me, obviously headed for a landing at geiger international airport.  with myself seated in the same position in my car seat and by aligning my vision again with the rear view mirror, i could see that the path of the airplane was exactly where the triangle would have been only seconds before.
content.summary: While in my car, sitting still at a stop sign, i observed a triangle shaped object hovering in the northern sky.  it did not move at all (side to side or away or closer) the entire observation.

content.detailedDescription: My son was out side walking his dog, when he yelled for me to come out side fast. stood in drive way and watched the object float then suddenly picked up speed and disappeared in 3 sec.
content.summary: Day time, big as a house, started to change shape as it moved to north west

content.detailedDescription:
1. mountain view, california, on a long street called miramonte dr.(a suburban area}. 
  i got off work at a precision sheet-metal plant about 1:30 in the morning, and was driving my old courier pickup the long way to my home in san jose, when i turned left into a narrow side steet that branched off miramonte and ran under some trees at least half a mile from the nearest main street (el camino real). as the road curved left it was mostly invisible to the houses in the surrounding neighborhood except for a large house about half-a-block on the left as it neared the top of a hill. this small road also crossed a small creek about forty yards before that house on the other side.   
   2. it flashed bright lights in font of me and refused to move aside. in fact it edged toward me when i noticed up the road at least seven or eight others just like this one, flashing red white and blue lights as if mimicking an emergency vehicle. about four others seemed to be parked along the right side of the fence on the bridge above the creek. they too were all alight, and whether they were moving around or standing still, they all appeared to be hovering just above the ground. 
  i never saw anything like this my whole life. these could not even be experimental vehicles in my opinion, in that only a small child could possible sit comfortably in any one of these. and they made no sound at all, as if they floated without any motors that we're familiar with.   
   3. i actually thought it was some very intelligent teenager's idea of some high-tech practical joke, or some new advanced public utility or emergency vehicle of some sort. this was after all- silicon valley.
   4. i knew it was nothing of "this" world as it floated just above the ground about a little over three feet high, and shaped just like a pyramid from egypt. four sides; while each triangular side appeared to be nearly or precisely equalateral, and able to display maybe fifty different small piercing round or square shaped lights so bright, their shapes at the base were hard to determine. and only red white and blue, and always and equal amount of all three colors on each side, randomly distributed with no apparent pattern aside from the overall pyramid pattern. and always, each flash came on for only an extremely quick flicker just like a strobe-light. just like you see on bicycles and most emergency vehicles. it would not suprise me if each light flickered red, white, and blue from the same spot each time. no other lights of any other magnitude or color were ever seen. 
  these craft never hovered more than a foot or more above the ground, and none of them took off or went up into the sky, nor ever descended from the sky either (no doubt they did though).
  none of them appeared to be showing off...Just hanging around casually, except for the craft right in front of me which appeared to be guiding itself emotionally by hovering side to side while apparently having the ability to rotate on it's central axis just mildly enough so as not to really scare me but to let me know it was not afraid, and could get serious if i drove any further (which i did not). 
  the other crafts may not have noticed in the very short time i came upon them, but this "one" craft before me seemed to be playing point-guard for the rest. also, they were probably quite sure that the occupants of the nearest house, a two-story, were asleep as it was nearly 2:00 a.M., on a week day.
  many large trees surrounded the otherwise sprawling suburb scattered around an occaisional open field or farm or two. 
   5. i hit the brakes. stared only for a about two seconds, and decided, "i'm outa here"!... shifted into reverse, did a backwards y-turn toward my right rear up a slight embankment of earth, and tore off in the oppposite direction up the miramonte dr. that i came from.
   6. i was about thirty yards from where i backed up when i actually had the nerve to look in my rear view mirror and noticed he was tailing me!  not too closer however when i seemed to be outgaing him as he was getting smaller in my rear-view. half way to el camino real, i noticed it was gone and was certain it had no intention of following me, and just wanted to shoo me away. thank god! i was always under the impression that this was a geniune ufo, and could have done anything it wanted to.
   7.  it just disappeared in my rear-view mirror.
content.summary: late night, on a narrow road in my small pickup under large trees, i saw right in front of me about a 3 to 4-foot high pyramid shape completely flashing with numerous strobe-like lights. all red white and blue hovering about one foot off the ground.

content.detailedDescription:
It was early morning before daylight i was seeing my mother off to work.  i was watching her leave the drive way and i stood staring out the front window looking at the hills when i notice 2 large headlights and thought that there were people 4 wheeling in the hills.

the lights stopped and then moved straight up in the air.  i then thought that it must be a hellicopter.  the sun was then coming out and i continued to watch the lights and the object moved toward our housing area.

by the time it was in clear view the sun was up and it was in no way anything i'd ever even heard of.  i even called 911 to ask if there were any gov't things going on and i remember her asking me why? i told here because what im seeing isnt anything i've ever seen before. lol she told me to get up at the same time the next morning and see if i saw it again.  displeased we ended the call.  oh i did ask if anyone else had called in about this she said no.

it flew directly over our house and the detail was strange because there really wasnt that much.  it was black, coal black the front was the shape of a ball and i could see windows but they too were black the only reason i knew they were windows was because of the shine.  a short way behind, the middle of the ship was thin tubular with 2 rather short wings not a perfect triangular shape but wide then narrowed to a rounded point or end.  past the wings the tubular shape continued to the back and end of ship where there were 3 fins as a plane has and behind those were round rocket ship engines [ok i dont know what else to call them] but when u see a rocket ship [nasa] go up it was just like that except it only glowed and there was no noise just a low hum.

i did get up the next day but it was a little bit later than the day before, there was nothing and nothing on the news anywhere.

i watched this ship from the hills of mira vista and went to the back yard and watched leave.

to this day...No one has ever reported seeing something of this shape.  and i'll tell you if they do that's something that should be investigated.

just for a bit of info.  my brother-in-law's brother was there at area 51 [as he told us] he said yes it was true he had seen them.  another siting was in concord ca my best friend who at the time i hadn't met but they had a block party and they all saw a ship that hovered over their court for about 20 minutes.

my reactions....I was in ahh and surprised, excited and then for a moment a little bit afraid that they might take me or my dogs out from the back yard.

please call if you need any more info.

thank you,
pam
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Long black extremely slow moving over house about 3-5 stories above

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving north on i-15 just entering vegas.  at this point on the freeway you can veiw the city skyline from a elevated vantage.  looking at the entire city i saw two lights  lights above the city coming together from the right and the left at high speed.  at the point they met each other they both spun in a tight circle 3 0r 4 times then broke away.  one     light flew to the right and dove to the ground as if it was landing at nellis.  durring this time the other object seemed to just sit still (as if it was waiting for the first)  then bam! it darts to the right and followed the path of the first object to the ground.
  at first i thought fighter jets due to the speeds.  but when i saw them come togeter and spin! a circle then seperate from each other as the did, i knew this was not normal.  after they were gone i looked at the cars driving next to me to see if they noticed it as well. unfortunatly at 65 or 70 miles per hr you can't just ask the driver next to you a question!  the only reason i lost sight of them is because it looked to mee they landed.  but these were not jets.  no plane can do what i saw. no way!!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Flying lights

content.detailedDescription:
We came out of a store about 3pm and looked up and saw a ufo, it was like looking at a mountian from a distance ( u could tell it was huge ) if u held a beach ball at arms lenthg it would just cover the object it had no markings at all, and sat in the sky with no sound or power exhust of any kind.

i nuged the guy to my left with my arm so as not to let the ship see and said in a very low voice, go get somebody and before the guy to my left could turn around to go get someone the ufo shurderd and flew away at a 30 degree angle
with unreal speed and gave the inpression that it dispeared
i think i followed with my eyes as far as i could, until it became a dot in the distance then i lost it.

it was a round and siver,  it was metal  with no seams or markings like a steel ball, it had to be hunders of meters from top to bottom and it was powered, the way it shurdered was like a jet engine trimbles when it is powered up and the aircraft is not moving forward.  , it could see us and hear us,it gave the inpression that it was maned,  its leaving the area was not a mistake, it left as i told clint to go get somebody.

the three of us will never forget it, even all these years later.
one of the men that saw the ufo is a fireman for detroit and the outher is a network administrator. 
i am a electronice and computer tech and a network admin.
content.summary: Three of us saw a ship, very large no markings and no sound, it was still and hovering in the sky but it was so big and siver in color, it moved  with a motion that i have never seen in my life time, all three of us saw it and the size of the object  huge

content.detailedDescription: The west hills of portland house sitting and drinking coffee on the deck.  looking up,being a aviation buff, i watched a dash 8 pass by overhead, as it passed by my eye stopped almost directly overhead and i saw an object beyond the aircraft. it was not moving and the owner of the house had a telescope with a 90 degree viewer. i set it up and viewed it for over 30 minutes. my girlfriend viewed it for about the same. we were amazed that it was barely moving...Like watching the moon move through the same telescope.  we had to leave to pick up the home owners,but it was still there. i called the national weather service to ask about weather baloons in the area and they told me that they had none reported at that time.
content.summary: Opaque circle with a distinct line bisecting it

content.detailedDescription: Well i took my dog outside and looked up into the sky like i always do when outside at night with her. i saw the object directly above me then saw it dancing and going up and down. i could tell imediatly that it wasnt a plane or helicopter. i didnt hear anything. i just felt intense fear and the urge to get in my car and bolt. but i kept standing there looking waiting to see what it was going to do next. i went inside and tried to call a friend but couldnt get ahold of her. i went back outside and called my dog to me and she noticed it too. i saw her looking at it as she ran for the door.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A circle of light danced in the sky and got closer to me

content.detailedDescription:
I need to know if anyone can give me confirmation on something i saw 1.23.06 at 22:35 central. small flashes of light very near to sirius in canis maj. it went on from the time i noticed it until around 22:45. i've contacted several ovservatories; only one replied and wasn't observing in that direction. it looked like some battle taking place far away. there may be a plausable explaination but in all my years of observing the heavens, i have never seen anything like it. 
the flashes of white light were located from my vantage point very close to sirius in the souther sky. they were faint but i was still able to see them with the naked eye in town. at first when i glanced up i thought they were on a jet but as i watched. they were random, not moving, like little explosions far away. very quick probably not lasting for more than .03-.05 seconds. i am 99 percent sure i also saw a green/blue streak, very faint that looked about 1/4 of an inch long. these were not meteors, not irridum flares, not like anything i have seen before. seriously, (no pun intended) it looked like something you would watch on tv like a space battle far away. my location is in west texas and i have witnesses. i checked the star charts and satellite locations and was unable to explain it.
content.summary: Flashes of light around sirius

content.detailedDescription: I was standing by my shed and looking up in the north sky at a bright star just before dusk but it was still light outside.And noticed slightly to the right of the star i saw something like a large blackdoorway whith silvery objects going in to it  and some objects coming out.It only lasted for about a minute or less. then the black rectangle shifted sideways then dissappeared. this happened the next couple of nights,then suddenly stopped.
content.summary: I was at my old house at the time  looking at the first star in the north and slightly to the right of it i noticed just before dusk a blackdoorway, a rectangle and it appeared that some type of objects silvery in color were flying in and out of this area
Only saw lights not out line of ufo.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the south side of my house. i let my dog out to go pee. then my dog started wimpering and was looking up at something and it was not me. i looked up to the position my dog was looking at and i saw the ufo silently flying over head. no sound was coming from what i could hear, but the stars were disapearing as the object flew over head and then that stars came back as it was flying by. extreamly large, dark in color, noticed one forward portal or low light centered forward and one aft, and centered. ufo was coming from the west to the east in direction. immediatly i called the temple airport about a craft flying there and asked if one was in flight. they had nothing on radar. informed me to call fort hood. i called west fort hood military air field, and they said nothing had been flying in the last couple hours, and the planes don't travel that rout. then stated there was nothing on radar either and no flights in two hours. then the person on the phone asked me what was my name, phone number, and address. i then said , "no thanks" and hung up. why were they wanting to know that info? i knew i saw something special and have told a few people about it thru the years. i'm also retired military, one of the best marksmen this country has produced and am highly decorated. i know what i saw, and it was not from here, unless there is something very secret going on and i just happen to see it due to an animals instinctive actions. 

               father of a fallen hero,
                  gary w. qualls
              www.Quallsmemorialfund.Org
content.summary: High flying rectangular dark ufo, small light forward and aft, centered, no sound, stars dissapeared as the craft flew overhead. my dog was the one to notice it and was wimpering looking upward. unusual for an animal to do that then that's when i saw it.

content.detailedDescription:
Full description of event/sighting: in the summer of 1992, two friends and i witnessed a ufo in willsboro ny. my father owns a house on lake champlain in willsboro bay. we were up at night sitting on the back deck of my father's boat house. it was a very quite and still night, there was a heavy overcast, but at a high altitude. i noticed what i thought was a plane at that time, flying across the sky from west to east, and at first i thought nothing of it. but it turned around and went back from east to west and behind the mountains there. the light came out again and flew the same pattern, going from east to west and then turning around. the third time it came out i took notice because i thought it odd that this, what i thought was a plane at that time, was flying in circles. i was aware that there was an air force fuel depot directly under where this object was flying. this is directly north of skagarack mountain on the shore of lake champlain.

so i mentioned all this to the guys i was with and i think we thought it was a government plane and one of us came up with the idea to flash our flashlight at it. immediately, a beam of light shown out of the object and illuminated the porch we were standing on to the point that when we turned around there our shadows were cast on the wall. the distance between the object and us at this point is approximately 1 to 1.5 miles and none of us were aware that a light could shine precisely on 3 people from that distance. this is the point that we all knew that something very abnormal was going on. we all became very alarmed at this and i remember that we began to tremble. the object then went west, behind skagarack mountain again, on the north side of the mountain. we thought that it may have left because it did not come out again moving east as it had before. so we were slightly relieved, that perhaps the air force was not after us. however, it came out from behind the skagarack mountain on the south side, north of rattlesnake mountain, this time a little closer to us!

at this point it was going strait up and down, repeatedly coming from behind skagarack mountain, and each time it raised above the mountain, the beam of white light was painting us. it was almost as if it was playing a game with us. then it flew over the mountain and started flying around the bay, and this is when we got a really good look at it. it was basically a ball of pulsating light, there was no wings, no rotors, and discernable body or fuselage. just a pulsating light that would change colors constantly, as the colors changed, one color seemed to just meld in the next color, i remember it being mainly reddish orange. perhaps the oddest thing was that it was absolutely silent, it made absolutely no noise at all. it moved well within the normal envelope of normal aircraft, there was nothing remarkable about how the thing moved. at this point a train was coming down the tracks on the opposite side of the bay from where we were, and the object immediately lost interest in us and painted its light on the train and followed it for a short time. then it left the train, floated across the bay maybe .25 miles north of where we were and headed to the same side of shore that we were on. it disappeared behind the horizon there and at this point my friends and i ran around the front side of the house to find it but it was gone, and that was the last we saw of it.
content.summary: Willsboro, new york beam of light shines down from object hitting witnesses

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of a rainbow then downloaded them to my pc and seen objects all through the photos that weren't there when i took the photos; nor were they ever. i then took another set of photos about 10 min. after the originals to make sure it wasn't my camera. sure enough it definitely wasn't a problem with the camera; they weren't on the second set of photos. so it all comes back to..Something happened that i cannot explain. i never seen the objects in physical form ..Just in my first set of photos. i have quite a few more photos to show you before and after shots to prove they are not there 10 min. later.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Disc,  Oval,  Other,  Unknown
content.summary: Photos of objects unexplainable.

content.detailedDescription: I was on a 24 hr pass from ft. mccoy wi.  i am a national guard member that was activated at that time to head to iraq.  my wife and i were about 30-45min east of the fort, heading home to get married.  i noticed a light in the sky first, but i thought nothing of it simply because it gave off a street light glow.  about ten minutes later my wife said, "what the hell is that."  i said what do you mean, at this point i was pretty tired.  we we're in the country at this point of our trip.  the light we saw went from one to two same size light, then too a total of 4 with the next two smaller.  now i was a bit scared, and being a soldier that takes a lot to get to that point.  i have only told my family members, and now you who choose to listen.
content.summary: 2 lights in sky that became a total of 4

content.detailedDescription: I was with my friend in the back yard when he pointed up towards the trees in the back of our adjoined yards and he just said, "look". when i looked up there was a golden colored,almost like a flattened egg shaped craft with some other smaller protrusions like boxes and pipes all the same color gold. it hovered above the trees silently and we knew it was looking at us and we just stood there for maybe 20 seconds but then it slowly raised straight up and suddenly shot up again and was gone in a blink of an eye all without making a sound although we were only a couple hundred feet away. the friend i was with is an somewhat popular actor and i would not want to embarass him by naming him. i have always wanted to ask him if he remembered that since i don't think we ever discussed it afterwards. i was in sixth grade at the time and 11 years old. i remember that because i made some drawings of it in school but never showed them to anyone.
content.summary: Playing in back yard sited gold-colored, silent object hovering above trees

content.detailedDescription: We were driving back to yonkers, ny from ry, new york coming back from the carnvial called playland.  i was sitting in the back seat looking up through the windshield, i was only 7 years old.  i saw this triangular shaped ufo in the sky just gliding right over the car in the opposite direction right above us.  nobody saw but me.  i was too shocked to say a word.  i turne around and watched it glide away.  somebody else had to have seen it for it flew right above a parkway.  it had 3 big red lights in the corner, and a white light in the middle that was kinda of like a laserlike white beam.  triangle in shape and looks identicle to the triangle ufo picture taken in belgium during the sightings in the early 90s or late 80s. the picture i saw online had me shocked and scared.  when i was younger, i used to think they were going to come back after me.  i told my mother and my psychiatrist, and drew a picture of it.  i used to be scared when i would see a light shine through my city window thinking the alines were going to come get me.  if i didnt see this i dont think i would believe in ufos.
content.summary: 3 big red lights on corner, little white light in middle

content.detailedDescription: I was on a 24 hr pass from ft. mccoy wi.  i am a national guard member that was activated at that time to head to iraq.  my wife and i were about 30-45min east of the fort, heading home to get married.  i noticed a light in the sky first, but i thought nothing of it simply because it gave off a street light glow.  about ten minutes later my wife said, "what the hell is that."  i said what do you mean, at this point i was pretty tired.  we we're in the country at this point of our trip.  the light we saw went from one to two same size light, then too a total of 4 with the next two smaller.  now i was a bit scared, and being a soldier that takes a lot to get to that point.  i have only told my family members, and now you who choose to listen.
content.summary: 2 lights in sky that became a total of 4

content.detailedDescription:
Outside at my grandmothers farm playing with a small b&w camera.

i practicly (bonked into it)! i had a feeling like a charge in the air, turned to my left and it was just, one of those "oh my god" moments. 

i was about 13 at the time but i knew exactly what it was. it was dead silent for a while. anytime you see that large disk like abject (30 feet in diameter) hovering maybe 20 feet in the air it gets your attention.  if it was a taco stand it would have had a similer effect.

the object was a silver grey titanium colour, almost looked like it was sandblasted.  the photos i took were extreamly clean and sharp. no fuzzy pics here. i was only about 50' from the object.
i like to think that i was pretty cool for a kid but it was just so bizarre.  the odd thing was it had three rails on it's bottom half running "front"? to back about three feet tall and 12" thick with what looked like a small hole drilled through each one lengh wise.

my reaction was getting a little overwelmed and shocky.  it was like i knew who they were from before.  the air started to feel like when you stand under a high power transmission line. the air crackled. a large cracking sound like a whip and it was gone.

later when i grew up i contacted proffesor j.Allen hynek when he was still living in ill.  after a few chats on the phone i sent him, via registered letter, the only copy of the prints i had.  i wish i had saved the negetives but we moved around a lot and, well that's life.

any way, this was around may 10 1984 and i still have his signiture on the return recipt  r197693818 dr. ja hynek  1623 ridge ave. evinston ill. 60201. 

he called me back and was just blown away by the photos.  i have never personaly seen them on the newstand ufo mags but i think if they ever became public they would have been classics of the first order, rasor sharp, in your face object!

not long after, i believe dr. hynec moved to arizona and passed on not long after.  we never talked about this again after his move and i was wondering if perhaps his wife might know were these pictures may have gotten to. by the way i might have sent these photos as slides.

if you can help in this matter i would be so gratfull and perhaps we can put another piece of the puzzle in it's place. 

sincerely  sela annette rice
content.summary: I was out in the country at a relative's farm and playing around with a cheep little b&w box camera. looked up & there it was.

content.detailedDescription:
Outside at my grandmothers farm playing with a small b&w camera.

i practicly (bonked into it)! i had a feeling like a charge in the air, turned to my left and it was just, one of those "oh my god" moments. 

i was about 13 at the time but i knew exactly what it was. it was dead silent for a while. anytime you see that large disk like abject (30 feet in diameter) hovering maybe 20 feet in the air it gets your attention.  if it was a taco stand it would have had a similer effect.

the object was a silver grey titanium colour, almost looked like it was sandblasted.  the photos i took were extreamly clean and sharp. no fuzzy pics here. i was only about 50' from the object.
i like to think that i was pretty cool for a kid but it was just so bizarre.  the odd thing was it had three rails on it's bottom half running "front"? to back about three feet tall and 12" thick with what looked like a small hole drilled through each one lengh wise.

my reaction was getting a little overwelmed and shocky.  it was like i knew who they were from before.  the air started to feel like when you stand under a high power transmission line. the air crackled. a large cracking sound like a whip and it was gone.

later when i grew up i contacted proffesor j.Allen hynek when he was still living in ill.  after a few chats on the phone i sent him, via registered letter, the only copy of the prints i had.  i wish i had saved the negetives but we moved around a lot and, well that's life.

any way, this was around may 10 1984 and i still have his signiture on the return recipt  r197693818 dr. ja hynek  1623 ridge ave. evinston ill. 60201. 

he called me back and was just blown away by the photos.  i have never personaly seen them on the newstand ufo mags but i think if they ever became public they would have been classics of the first order, rasor sharp, in your face object!

not long after, i believe dr. hynec moved to arizona and passed on not long after.  we never talked about this again after his move and i was wondering if perhaps his wife might know were these pictures may have gotten to. by the way i might have sent these photos as slides.

if you can help in this matter i would be so gratfull and perhaps we can put another piece of the puzzle in it's place. 

sincerely  sela annette rice
content.summary: I was out in the country at a relative's farm and playing around with a cheep little b&w box camera. looked up & there it was.

content.detailedDescription: I was young at the time and it might be nothing just bare with me here.  my mom and i were at a drive-in theater just sitting there waiting for it to become dark enough for them to turn on the movies.  it was just after dusk, the sun had disappeared but the sky was still a little bit bright.  i love looking at the stars so while we were waiting i normally just gazed up at the sky and looked at the stars.  well on this night i just happened to be looking up at the stars then my mom asked me if i wanted a drink or anything and i looked at her and said something and when i looked up back at the sky, the star that i had seen not a minute or two ago was gone.  now i was young at the time but i knew at the time stars don't just disappear.  i looked at my mom and told her that a star had just disappeared.  the strange disapperance of the star wasn't the only weird thing that happened.  not within a couple of minutes of this star disappearing and my ranting to my mother about a star disappearing about two or three what looked liked black  army helicopters had started to circle right around where the star had originally been. before the helicopters had come by i thought i had just been seeing things but once the helicopters came i started to think there might have been somethign that happened that night.  i only tell you guys this now because i just now heard of guys, perhaps there was a similar sighting or something that my observation might be able to help you guys out with another sighting that might have been similar that night. to be honest i wasn't too sure of the year, i'm only 22 and i saw it when i was like 10 or  maybe even younger than that.  anyways thanks for your time i hope you guys find this useful.
content.summary: Please read my detailed description

content.detailedDescription: I am a true beleiver and i knew they were coming, i was with my friend and he spotted it and felt afraid. i then tried to calm him, and enjoy the moment we both felt afraid. my friend and i witnessed a helicopter flying, trying to avoid the violent object, we decided to leave it be and move on.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Unknown
content.summary: A hellicopter was flying next to the object. it was a violent ufo and the helicopter tried to avoid it?

content.detailedDescription: Detailed description is attached bellow.
content.summary: Being moved to the other side.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving south on hwy 89 a few miles south of keyenta az at approx 60 mph. a person dressed in total white apeared in the middle of the road, 40ft in front. skidded to a stop, but not in time to avoid hitting the person. checked the area and the vehicle and found nothing. bright moon lite, so had good view of a large area. no sound of impact as if i had hit something.
left area. 1/2 mile later, engine dies and headlites fail. interior lites, brake lites, emergency flashers, radio are all dead. checked battery with vom and flashlite and registered 0 volts. escorted family into a safe area off highway and returned to vehicle for blankets. interior lite  came on, checked battery again and registered 12 volts,
so we continued on. checked engine voltage at next lighted stop, and found 14 volts with engine running. upon return to denver, checked battery, cables, generator, other wiring and found nothing unusal. considered a main fuse breaking, then
in some way shorting itself to regain electrical power, but fuses showed nothing, burn marks, etc. had vehicle for many years after event and nothing similar ahppened.
content.summary: Person then totally dead vehicle

content.detailedDescription: I had just got home from work and decided to sit outside on our patio to enjoy the evening and relax. movement in an area where no stars where visible. i first thought it may have been satalites, until they slowed then took a 45 deg. path. then moments later another star following the same  path moved to the point where the other two slowed and turned, it also slowed but then proceded forward on its original coarse. i watch all of them until they where no longer visible.
